CCDD

Class CcddTableEditorHandler.FixedColumnHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • CCDD.CcddTableEditorHandler.FixedColumnHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    Enclosing class:
    CcddTableEditorHandler

    private class CcddTableEditorHandler.FixedColumnHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Create a fixed column handler. When enabled, the leftmost column in the table if duplicated and the duplicate is displayed at the left side of the table. When the table is scrolled horizontally the fixed column remains in place. The fixed column cannot be edited directly; however, changes to the original column contents are reflected in the duplicate. Also, changes in the original (duplicate) column's width are made to the duplicate (original) column
